def_cn: 哈利路亚（用于宗教唱诵和祷词中，意为赞美和感谢上帝）
def_en: Hallelujah is used in religious songs and worship as an exclamation of praise and thanks to God.

def_cn: 哈利路亚！（对期望已久的事发生表示高兴）
def_en: People sometimes say 'Hallelujah!' when they are pleased that something they have been waiting a long time for has finally happened.
